column1: Weighted MRI image size (128, 256, 1) in T2, depicting the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section n°80 beginning from the right hemisphere of the skull. The section reveals the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 2448.1934 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 6488.9648 mm³ and the left cerebellar cortex of volume 939.9902 mm³.

MRI size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2, showing the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section n°80 initiated from the right hemisphere of the skull. The observed details include: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 2448.1934 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 6488.9648 mm³ and the left cerebellar cortex of volume 939.9902 mm³.

MRI size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2, illustrating the head of a man of 37 years old of sagittal section. The observation focuses on slice n°80 from the right hemisphere of the skull. We see the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 2448.1934 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 6488.9648 mm³ and the left cerebellar cortex of volume 939.9902 mm³.

Image size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2 of the MRI, showing the head of a man of 37 years old of sagittal section. Slice n°80 is observed starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The section reveals the presence of: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 2448.1934 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 6488.9648 mm³ and the left cerebellar cortex of volume 939.9902 mm³.
